thread.title: Trump Says He Might Hold Up South Korea Trade Talks to Pressure the North

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Trump Says He Might Hold Up South Korea Trade Talks to Pressure the North
text:
President Donald Trump floated the idea of delaying trade negotiations with South Korea to use them as leverage for reaching a deal with North Korea.
Speaking in Richfield, Ohio, on Thursday, Mr. Trump said of renegotiating the U.S.’s trade deal with South Korea: “I may hold it up until after a deal is made with North Korea.…You know why? Because it’s a very strong card.”
The... RELATED VIDEO What Could Go Wrong at a Trump-Kim Summit? A meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un could be a diplomatic breakthrough, but both men are nothing if not unpredictable.
